attributes.action: full time eduaction for all 3 yr olds
attributes.additional_details: y child deserves a education and at 3 years of age they should be able to go into full time education but with the government cutting back on things the nursery's are gonna be hit which will lead to all children at the age of 3 will be held back from full time education and to stay part time! ITS WRONG the 1st years of school are the most important years for their development and well being!! well we can all make a stand to stop this happening EVERY CHILD DESERVES FULL TIME EDUCATION
